experience.stack: React, TypeScript, MobX, Canvas, PixiJS, Jest

description.common:
Evolution is a leading global provider of B2B services for online casinos, partnering with top operators worldwide. The company develops innovative gaming products and platforms, including live casinos, game shows, and slots, delivering the highest quality user experience for players.
My area of responsibility:
achievements: Create games from the scratch, based on React+Canvas;
Fix issues and bugs in existing games;

experience.stack: React, TypeScript, Tailwind, Zustand, GraphQL, Apollo Client, WebSockets, ProseMirror, Universal router, Nest, Vite

description.common:
TINT is personalized assistant based on AI, with your personal context. The product had not yet been publicly released when I left the company.
My area of responsibility:
achievements: Building frontend architecture from scratch;
Selecting technologies and specific libraries;
Implementing a full-fledged text editor (based onProseMirror);

experience.stack: React, TypeScript, MobX, WebSockets, Playwright, Jest, ProseMirror, Node.js

description.common:
Juro is a London-based startup funded by venture capital firms such as Eight Roads, Union Square Ventures, Point Nine Capital, Seedcamp, and Taavet Hinrikus.
The most interesting challenges as Senior Frontend Engineer:
responsibilities: Refactoring legacy code (replacing the UI-Router (Angular) with React-Router v6). Developed a transition plan and its implementation;
Led a development team of 5 people;
Participated in the hiring process for engineers, conducted technical interviews;
Implemented self-service payment systems with interface restrictions for different plans;
Performance optimization, including the use of profilers and developer tools;
Prepared and conducted a workshop for colleagues on effective work with React + MobX;
description.common2: The most interesting challenges as Frontend Engineer:
achievements: Implemented and started using E2E tests (Playwright);
Improved performance through optimization of work with MobX;
Standardized the codebase through automation of usage ESLint and Prettier;
Implemented a toolkit for easy addition and updating of tours in the application;

experience.stack: React, Redux, WebSockets, GraphQL, Apollo Client, React Native

description.common:
Participated in the development of a big and complicated project (startup). Company's main product was e-document management system: catalogue with complicated filters, full-text editor, visualisation of logic on Canvas, great performance attention.
My area of responsibility was:
responsibilities: Created and delivered a JavaScript (FE) course (in terms of HR-activities);
Development the main (web) and mobile (React Native) applications;
achievements: In-house implementation of i18n, pluralization and formatting of dates/currencies/numbers;
System for page formatting (JSON-like structure which was being formatted in A3, A4, A5 pages with continue styles between pages). Required for text editor;

description.common:
Developed a communication platform for manufacturers and small retailers, improving industry-wide collaboration.
My area of responsibility was:
achievements: Led the selection of tools and technologies for project development;
Translated mockups into user-friendly interfaces, ensuring seamless user experiences;
Collaborated closely with backend developers and designers;
Led the development of an automatisation system for a governmental institution;
Responsible for selecting appropriate tools and technologies;
Translated mockups and specifications provided by analysts into a user-friendly interface;
Collaborated with backend developers to design and implement efficient APIs;
Successfully delivered a fully functional product to the customer;

description.common: Work in a big team. Main activities:
achievements: Development interface from mockups
Bugfix
Building of new functionality
